title: MD
biography: Dr. Anant Bhan is a prominent researcher, trainer, and physician with over 20 years of expertise in global health, health policy, and bioethics. He served as the Immediate Past President of the International Association of Bioethics (2017-2019). Dr. Bhan is recognized as a leading voice on medical ethics and social justice issues in India, focusing on equity in health, mental health, and digital health ethics.
aiSummary: Anant Bhan is a global health & bioethics specialist with an H-index of 110 at Sangath (Principal Investigator & Bhopal Hub Lead). Has been published in Nature, Journal of Technology in Behavioral Science, The Lancet Infectious Diseases and recipient of the undefined (undefined). Based in Bhopal, Madhya Pradesh, India.
education: MHSc in Bioethics, University of Toronto
PG Diploma in Medical Law and Ethics, NLSIU Bangalore
